Posts.Content: A friend tried the cold cap treatment last year and said she couldn't bear the feeling. I have decided not to bother, got some lovely long scarves to wind round my head 'artistically' (ho ho). Besides I haven't seen my true hair colour for 45 years so I'll look forward to that, even with the grey bits. Also how I agree with the almost patronising attitude. So far I try to jest my way out of it. People mean well........
Posts.Title: Starting EC and advice on scalp cooling please!!!
